infos.value: Damn it! Let's finish this!
Stop! We're not your enemy!
Please, listen to me!
Shut your mouth!
Lord Mont... This one is helpless.
His ire clouds his reasoning.
But if we continue this fight...
Khury's lapdogs, all of you!
You're mistaken! We hail from Leonis!
Silence!
Enough, Vadim.
B-Big Sister...
"Big Sister"...? So you're—
Margritte. I lead this humble band.
I am Mont, the elder prince of Leonis.
Leonis!? What do you want with us?
We came to request your aid.
All right.
I—huh!?
What? I said we'll aid you. Do you doubt me?
But, why would you—?
You're Lady Glaciela's betrothed, are you not?
(Lord Mont, just play along for now!)
...Something the matter?
Th-that's right. I'm Glaciela's betrothed.
And...? What can we do for you?
Well...
I see. You need our help assaulting Fennes's fortress.
Right. What do you say?
I'm not opposed to exchanging blows with Fennes.
But if we do, it would be to Khury's benefit.
So I have to ask...whose side are you really on—Khury's or Lady Glaciela's?
King Oelde has suffered grievous injuries. He is being held within Wezette Castle.
...I see.
In other words, Khury is using your weakness to his advantage.
So after we take down this fortress and save your King Oelde...
You'll be joining up with Lady Glaciela. Am I understanding this correctly?
Of course. Right, Lord Mont?
R-right.
...Then we have an agreement. But we might want a little extra firepower, just to be safe.
You perhaps have someone in mind?
I happen to know a dragoon of considerable skill...
You go ahead. We'll convince her to join us.
And don't worry—we'll catch up.
Very well. Then we shall make our way to the fortress.
